events.name: Electric vehicle battery
events.wd_description: An electric vehicle battery is a rechargeable battery.
events.description: An electric vehicle battery is a rechargeable battery.

events.name: Lithium-ion Batteries
events.wd_description: The dominant battery type for EVs, including variants like Li-NMC and Li-NCA.
events.description: The dominant battery type for EVs, including variants like Li-NMC and Li-NCA.

events.name: Li-NMC
events.wd_description: Lithium nickel manganese cobalt oxide batteries, known for high performance but with environmental concerns.
events.description: Lithium nickel manganese cobalt oxide batteries, known for high performance but with environmental concerns.

events.name: Li-NCA
events.wd_description: Lithium nickel cobalt aluminum oxide batteries, another common lithium-ion battery type.
events.description: Lithium nickel cobalt aluminum oxide batteries, another common lithium-ion battery type.

events.name: Recycling
events.wd_description: Processes for recycling EV batteries to recover valuable materials and reduce environmental impact.
events.description: Processes for recycling EV batteries to recover valuable materials and reduce environmental impact.

events.name: Pyrometallurgical Recovery
events.wd_description: Recovering metals by melting the battery in a hot furnace, transforming metal oxides into alloys.
events.description: Recovering metals by melting the battery in a hot furnace, transforming metal oxides into alloys.

events.name: Physical Materials Separation
events.wd_description: Separating battery materials physically without chemical reactions.
events.description: Separating battery materials physically without chemical reactions.

events.name: Hydrometallurgical Metal Reclamation
events.wd_description: Using aqueous solutions to leach and precipitate metals from batteries.
events.description: Using aqueous solutions to leach and precipitate metals from batteries.

events.name: Direct Recycling Method
events.wd_description: Directly recycling battery materials to avoid extensive processing.
events.description: Directly recycling battery materials to avoid extensive processing.

events.name: Biological Metals Reclamation
events.wd_description: Using bacteria to recover precious metals from batteries.
events.description: Using bacteria to recover precious metals from batteries.

events.name: Recycling Challenges
events.description: Only 6% of lithium-ion batteries were collected for recycling in 2017â€“2018 in Australia. In 2019, only 5% of electric vehicle batteries were recycled

events.name: Reusing and Repurposing
events.wd_description: Extending the lifecycle of EV batteries by repurposing them for stationary storage when they degrade to 70%-80% capacity.
events.description: Extending the lifecycle of EV batteries by repurposing them for stationary storage when they degrade to 70%-80% capacity.

relations.wd_description: qualifies something (inception or end of a thing, event, or date) as happening previously to another thing
